title: One of the East Coast’s Largest Ranches Lists for $75 Million
text:
A family ranch in rural Virginia is coming on the market for $75 million. One of the largest ranches on the Eastern Seaboard to come up for sale in recent memory, the property could set a record for the area, according to the agents representing the property.

Known as Eldon Stock Farm, the 7,100-acre property is beneath Thornton Gap, where the Blue Ridge Mountains meet the Virginia Piedmont region. There are dozens of structures on the ranch, including four main homes. There is Clover Hill, an early 19th-century stone home...
description: Owned by the same family for almost six decades, Eldon Stock Farm spans 7,100 acres in rural Virginia.
